var wg sync.WaitGroup

wg.Wait() fmt.Scan(&a) } func work(ch1, ch2 chan int, stopCh <-chan struct{}) { defer wg.Done() for { select { case <-stopCh: return case job1 := <-ch1: fmt.Println("receive ch1 on first loop:", job1) case job2 := <-ch2: priority: for { select { case job1 := <-ch1: fmt.Println("receive ch1 on second loop:", job1) default: time.Sleep(1000 * time.Millisecond) break priority } } // ÊâßË°å job1 ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ fmt.Println("receive ch2:", job2) } } }
